import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import { Divider, Header, Icon, Image, Message, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { getDetailByTaskByStudent } from '../../redux/slices/Grade'; export default function EndQuiz() { const {id} = useParams() const task = useSelector((state) => state.grades.grades) const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getDetailByTaskByStudent(id)) }, [id]) console.log(task); return (
{ !task ? (<>) : ( <>

); }
